typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		num_order as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		modo_envio as string,
		cliente_id as string,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		region_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TbOrdenes
source(output(
		{@id_modo} as string,
		{@Descripcion} as string,
		{@Tipo_x0020_ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ModoEnvio
source(output(
		{Region ID} as integer,
		{Region Desc} as string,
		{Detalle region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Regiones
source(output(
		{@id_tipo} as string,
		{@Descripción} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TipoEnvio
source(output(
		PK_Cliente as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MapCliente
Join2, ModoEnvio join(modo_envio == {@id_modo},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		id_modo_envio = modo_envio,
		cliente_id,
		imp_subtotal,
		region_id,
		{Region Desc},
		{Detalle region},
		modo_envio = {@Descripcion},
		id_Tipo_Envio = {@Tipo_x0020_ID},
		Tipo_envio = {@Descripción}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
TbOrdenes, Regiones join(region_id == {Region ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1, TipoEnvio join({@Tipo_x0020_ID} == {@id_tipo},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Select1 keyGenerate(output(PK_Orden as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
MapCliente select(mapColumn(
		PK_Cliente,
		Cliente_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDataCliente
SurrogateKey1, SelectDataCliente join(Select1@cliente_id == SelectDataCliente@Cliente_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Order as integer,
		num_order as integer,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		id_modo as integer,
		modo_envio as string,
		ID_Tipo_envio as integer,
		descripcion_envio as string,
		Region_ID as integer,
		Region_descripcion as string,
		Detalle_Region as string,
		PK_Cliente as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Order = PK_Orden,
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		imp_subtotal,
		id_modo = id_modo_envio,
		modo_envio,
		ID_Tipo_envio = id_Tipo_Envio,
		descripcion_envio = Tipo_envio,
		Region_ID = region_id,
		Region_descripcion = {Region Desc},
		Detalle_Region = {Detalle region},
		PK_Cliente
	)) ~> StoreTable
